House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00090
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING ACCIDENT AND LIFE INSURANCE COVERAGE FOR RAILWAY TRANSIT PASSENGERS
SHORT TITLE : Insurance For Railway Passengers Act
ABSTRACT : Aims to give focus to the security of the commuters who use the Philippine National Railways (PNR), the Metro Manila Transit (Metrostar/MRT3), Light Rail Transit (LRT) and the Megatren (LRT2) which is just apt and fitting for the government to give the public railway users the insurance that they deserve.
